import 'styles/test.css' import React, { useState } from 'react' import Header from 'components/Header' import Sidebar from 'components/Sidebar' import glazes from 'data/glazes.json' import bases from 'data/bases.json' function App() { const BLANK_GLAZE = {glaze: {id: "", base: "", additives : []}, base: {id: "", name: "", recipe : []}}; const [selectedGlaze, setSelectedGlaze] = useState(BLANK_GLAZE); return (<>
